title: List of 18th-century journals
data: Executive Journal of the Northwest Territory
A Journal of the Session : Containing the Decisions of the Lords of Council
Journal of the Illinois General Assembly , House of Representatives
The Journal of the House of Burgesses
Journal of proceedings , Maryland ( Colony ) Council
Journal of the Indian Roads Congress
section_title: Formal published subject-related journals by subject -- Governmental and other public inquiries
intro: This list of 18th-century journals covers published academic journals from a variety of fields, that were current and printed between 1700 and 1799. It also includes journals that, although initially published before 1700, were current and in print during that century as well. Note that a number of personal books and publications were also titled as journals; unless notable, these have been excluded.
